speaker: Shivani Patel
title: No Code Deployment and Enriched Model Registry with AML Service
description:
We'll be discussing updates to the Azure Machine learning service model registry to provide more insights about your model. Also, learn how you can deploy your models easily without going through the effort of creating additional driver and configuration files.

Learn More: 
Learn more about Azure Machine Learning service: http://aka.ms/azuremldocs 
Try out sample machine learning notebooks: https://aka.ms/AzureMLnotebooks

01:50 Intro to Simplified deployment with No code deployment feature
03:01 Demo for Workspace
03:50 Demo for No code deployment
